name: Marcel Digital
tagline: Bringing Transparency to Your Digital Universe
description:
Marcel Digital is a digital marketing and web development agency based in the River North neighborhood of downtown Chicago. Founded in March 2003, Marcel remains one of the original and most well established digital marketing firms in the United States.
Our data-driven approach to digital marketing and web development has allowed us to create some of the most innovative and comprehensive strategies in the industry. Our cross-trained utilizes services ranging from web development and conversion rate optimization, to search engine optimization and advanced analytics implementations to continuously increase your overall revenue, organic visibility, and website engagement.
Marcel Digital's goal is to bring transparency to the digital landscape and to collaborate with our clients to create truly sensational brand experiences.
Give us a call today: 312-255-8044
